text.label: Scheduled Start Date Range
text.placeHolder: Tap to enter start date range
Tap to enter end date range

text.value: Some required fields are empty. Specify the missing information.
Do you want to cancel the work order?
The specified asset is in location {0}. Do you want to replace the current location with location {1}? - If you do not want to update the current asset or the current location, click Close.
The specified location does not match the location of asset {0}. Do you want to update location and clear the asset? - If you do not want to apply changes to the location or asset, click Close.

message.defaultMessage: The work order status cannot change from {0} to {1}.
Specify a date that is later than the date of the last status change on {0}.
The specified log type was not found. Check your entry.
